text: Mr coconut drink are nice and refreshing. I love the original coconut drink, jelly and pudding. The staff are helpful by putting more ice on my jelly and pudding due to I be walking around east point mall in order to keep it fresh before I go back my place. Thank you to Mr Coconut’s staff - Annie at East point for being helpful and excellent.
Annie is super helpful! She was very patient in guiding us on how to order. Even when I missed a topping, she didn’t hesitate to assist us.
Left my dad to order while I bought something else and came back to see Annie patiently helping my father to order through the machine. Service was fast too. Great service.
At 3pm stood outside for.5 minutes and no customer around me. The 2 staff inside seems not interested to serve. Or even acknowledge..........end up not getting anything. Going to other outlet .
Annie was a sweet and energetic cashier who helped me with my order! Drink was made with love ! :)
